## OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder.(constructor)

Builds an `OmvFilterDescription` (internal type) that specifies an \[\[OmvFeatureFilter\]\] as well as an \[\[OmvFeatureModifier\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(options?: OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilder.OmvFeatureFilterDescriptionBuilderOptions);
```
